testimonials.text: Johnatan is extremely professional and easy to work with. I feel we made it much farther with him as part of the team. He is self-oriented and knowledgeable, but most of all he was dedicated--always giving his all which went a long way for the startup clients we served. There is no hesitation, I would definitely recommend because it was a pleasure working with him!

Johnatan has a really excelent trained eye, knows the tools of the programs with a perfect knowledge and he loves his work, which makes him an expert with a high performance. He is always interested in learning more as he also explains to others what he knows. He is a very dedicated professional with a great personality.
